replies.body: RIOT Why do you not release the champion as soon as the patch is live hate hating 2 weeks for more days
No Morde nerfs, cya next week guys..
They did the 2nd day morde was released btw, they are probably still looking at him to nerf again

"While it may seem like we're doing this just because of the in-vogue bot lane Sona, she's been extremely close to our thresholds for acceptable win rates"

Mmm, you smell that kids? It's the distinct whiff of BULLLSHIIIIT. Sona is now and has been garbage for a long time ever since you pulled all of her teeth out after the runes relaunch. The fact that you did absolutely nothing to Taric screams that you guys are full of it.

Look, I get it. Sona isn't flashy or exciting to watch. She doesn't pull as many esports viewers as someone like Pyke or Thresh. You need to keep her in the dumpster so that pros don't play her. Just be honest with us. We aren't as stupid as you seem to think we are.
